title: Cubs’ David Ross finally hits it out of the park on ‘Dancing with the Stars’

meta_data.description: With another championship on the line, retired Cubs catcher David Ross finally hit a home run with the “Dancing with the Stars” judges Monday. Ross and partner Lindsay Arnold earned a perfect 40 out of 40 points for their energetic, Cubs-inspired freestyle routine to a medley of “It Takes Two” and “Take Me Out to […]
